transcript:
Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir aaj to kya late ho gaye fir kal karenge apan.
Customer: Chaliye koi issue nahi hai fir main aapko na apne personal number se aapko whatsapp pe message dal de raha hu theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai aap kya karega mujhe jab aap free hote hain to aap mujhe waha pe message dal dena whatsapp pe main aapko us time connect kar lunga theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai aur aapka jo request tha sir video meeting ka ye main close kar deta hu sir theek hai.
Executive: Okay. Kyunki already hum connect kar chuke hain main aapko aap mujhe directly connect kar lijiyega sir like whatsapp pe.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Okay. To mail pe ek aapko satisfy ka option aayega use kar dijiyega na ho gaya.
Executive: Thank you.
Executive: Likhiyega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was late, will connect later.



Resolution:

- Customer will message on WhatsApp when free.

- Executive will connect at that time.

- Video meeting request closed as already connected.

- Executive requested customer to mark satisfaction on mail.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- whatsapp, video meeting, satisfaction
